content.raw:
@chapulina Well at first I was using the same values from [```gzclient ``` ](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/1762/link-frame-visual/diff#Lgazebo/rendering/LinkFrameVisual.ccT46) but apparently that doesn't look very well, so the values I'm using right now are my own, I tried to make the end resulted visual look as similar as possible as gzweb's. 

You can play with the values too and if you like get ones with better results we can use them then.
content.html:
@chapulina Well at first I was using the same values from gzclient but apparently that doesn't look very well, so the values I'm using right now are my own, I tried to make the end resulted visual look as similar as possible as gzweb's.

You can play with the values too and if you like get ones with better results we can use them then.
